thread.title_full: Sneak peak at Pixie Lott before Breakfast at Tiffany's - in Southampton

title: Sneak peak at Pixie Lott before Breakfast at Tiffany's - in Southampton
text:
Sneak peak at Pixie Lott before Breakfast at Tiffany's - at The Mayflower in Southampton Sneak peak at Pixie Lott before Breakfast at Tiffany's - in Southampton 0 comments 
HERE’S the first look of what Hampshire audiences can expect from singer turned theatre star Pixie Lott in Breakfast at Tiffany’s. 
The chart-topper is channelling Audrey Hepburn in the new shots, depicting her as Holly Golightly, the legendary actresses most famous role from the 1961 adaptation. Share article 
Pixie told the Daily Echo: “I absolutely love Holly’s style, and free spirit; she has always been an icon to me. Alongside music, I’ve always wanted to be in a play, and getting the opportunity to be in one of my all time favourites and play this fabulous character is a dream come true.” 
Breakfast at Tiffany’s comes to Mayflower Theatre from April 25 to 20 next year. Tickets are on sale now from 023 8071 1811 or mayflower.org.uk .
